Lobbyist Name: Irish Association of Speech and Language Therapists
Specific Details: IASLT presented at the Joint Committee on Autism: 28th February 2023 and made a written submission in advance of this appearance.
Subject Matter: IASLT presented at the Joint Committee on Autism: 28th February 2023 and made a written submission in advance of this appearance.
Intended Results:
To highlight IASLTs commitment to advocate for people with communication & feeding
support needs, ensuring that their rights under the UN Convention on the Rights for
People with Disabilities (UNCRPD) are promoted and protected so that all people
with a disability get the support they need to thrive and to live happy and full lives.  To advocate for the use of a Neurodiversity-Affirmative paradigm as the overarching prism through which disability, is viewed, discussed & supported.
Lobbying Activities: Submission made in advance of appearance at Joint Committee on Autism public meeting: https://www.iaslt.ie/media/z4mi1i1x/oireachtas-submission-feb-23.pdf|Meeting|1

Lobbyist Name: Gaeloideachas
Specific Details: Rún 16.1 – “That this Ard Fheis recognises the significant investment by Government in providing additional capacity across our education system and recognises the very significant growth of population in many areas that requires the speedy provision of additional Primary and Secondary School places.
DPOs Lobbied: Aisling Dolan|Senator|Seanad::Tim Lombard|Senator|Seanad::Micheál Carrigy|Senator|Seanad::Fergal Browne|Councillor|Carlow County Council::Úna McCarthy|Councillor|Cork County Council::Paul Kehoe|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas
Subject Matter: Rún 16.1 – “That this Ard Fheis recognises the significant investment by Government in providing additional capacity across our education system and recognises the very significant growth of population in many areas that requires the speedy provision of additional Primary and Secondary School places.
Intended Results: Labhair mé faoin bpróiseas bunú scoileanna a chruthaíonn deacrachtaí le scoileanna lán-Ghaeilge nua a bhunú, agus faoin ngá an rogha sin a chur ar fáil do thuismitheoirí toisc go bhfuil éileamh ann don oideachas lán-Ghaeilge. Luaigh mé an feachtas 2468 agus cúpla ceann eile timpeall na tíre, agus na spriocanna atá leagtha amach ag an rialtas le cainteoirí Gaeilge a fhostú san earnáil poiblí agus go gcabhródh soláthar oideachais lán-Ghaeilge leis na spriocanna sin a bhaint amach.
Lobbying Activities: Ard Fheis Fhine Gael |Event / Reception|1
